Returns: True if the dependents should be disabled, otherwise false.
shouldDisableDependents().Description: Checks whether this preference's dependents should currently be disabled.

Parameters: CharSequence: The summary to be shown when checked.
setSummaryOn(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Sets the summary to be shown when checked.

getSummaryOn().Description: Returns the summary to be shown when checked.

Parameters: Parcelable: The saved state that had previously been returned by @B_android#support#v7#preference#TwoStatePreference#onSaveInstanceState_E@.
onRestoreInstanceState(android.os.Parcel.Description: Hook allowing a Preference to re-apply a representation of its internal state that had previously been generated by @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference#onSaveInstanceState_E@. This function will never be called with a null state.

Parameters: CharSequence: The summary to be shown when unchecked.
setSummaryOff(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Sets the summary to be shown when unchecked.

Parameters: int: The summary as a resource.

onClick().Description: Processes a click on the preference. This includes saving the value to the @B_android#content#SharedPreferences_E@. However, the overridden method should call @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference#callChangeListener_E@ to make sure the client wants to update the preference's state with the new value.

Parameters: int: The summary as a resource.

getSummaryOff().Description: Returns the summary to be shown when unchecked.

Returns: A Parcelable object containing the current dynamic state of this Preference, or null if there is nothing interesting to save. The default implementation returns null.
onSaveInstanceState().Description: Hook allowing a Preference to generate a representation of its internal state that can later be used to create a new instance with that same state. This state should only contain information that is not persistent or can be reconstructed later.

Parameters: boolean: True to restore the persisted value; false to use the given defaultValue.
Object: The default value for this Preference. Only use this if restorePersistedValue is false.
onSetInitialValue(boolean, java.lang.Obj.Description: Implement this to set the initial value of the Preference. If @B_android#content#SharedPreferences_E@. If @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference#shouldPersist_E@ is true). In case of using @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceDataStore_E@, the true but the default value (if provided) is set. This may not always be called. One example is if it should not persist but there is no default value given.

Parameters: boolean: The preference state that should disable dependents.
setDisableDependentsState(boolean).Description: Sets whether dependents are disabled when this preference is on (true) or when this preference is off (false).

setChecked(boolean).Description: Sets the checked state and saves it to the @B_android#content#SharedPreferences_E@.

Returns: Whether dependents are disabled when this preference is on (true) or when this preference is off (false).
getDisableDependentsState().Description: Returns whether dependents are disabled when this preference is on (true) or when this preference is off (false).

ClassDesc: Common base class for preferences that have two selectable states, persist a boolean value in SharedPreferences, and may have dependent preferences that are enabled/disabled based on the current state.
